import React from 'react'; function Services() { return ( <>

Services

Our Service Offerings

Comprehensive overview of all services provided by NOXTM Studio.

Manage service packages, pricing, and client requirements.

  • Service catalog management
  • Pricing and package configuration
  • Service delivery tracking
  • Client service preferences

Design Services

Brand Identity & Design

Starting from $10

  • Logo design and branding
  • Visual identity systems
  • Print and digital materials
  • Brand guidelines

Development Services

Web Development

Starting from $100

  • Custom website development
  • E-commerce solutions
  • Mobile-responsive design
  • CMS integration

Marketing Services

Digital Marketing

Starting from $150

  • Social media marketing
  • Email marketing campaigns
  • SEO optimization
  • Content marketing

Consulting Services

Business Consulting

Custom pricing

  • Strategy development
  • Process optimization
  • Technology consulting
  • Growth planning

Service Statistics

Active Services: 12

Most Popular: Web Development

Highest Revenue: Digital Marketing

Client Satisfaction: 4.9/5

); } export default Services;
